name: octo-preview
description: Live preview for markdown comments in PR/Issues on GitHub

scripts.build-chrome: npm run clean && npm run build-js && npm run copy-chrome
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && rm -rf chrome/dist && mkdir -p dist chrome/dist
scripts.copy-chrome: cp chrome/{inject.js,manifest.json} chrome/dist && cp -r dist chrome

author: Andrew Levine
